long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Become more Echo-friendly by customizing your browser with EchoTab!
Echo-Tab is a free extension on Chrome web store, made to spread awareness on everyday activities and become more and more connected to nature.

Our goal with this browser extension is to provide people an easier way to learn about ecology and to provide them with some small pieces of green advice on how to avoid waste.

The project is Non-profit.
Spread EchoTab.
Become more Echo-friendly.

The Echotab extension does not use the internet to download or upload data, it is 100% privacy safe. This extension is available for Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge and Mozilla Firefox.
